name: Chicken Delicious
author: CORWYNN DARKHOLME
summary: For those of you who are trying to cut back on red meats, this is a great chicken recipe!! Full of flavor and savory fun!! Serve over hot, fluffy rice if desired.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
directions: Rinse the chicken breasts and pat dry
Season with the lemon juice, salt, pepper, celery salt and paprika to taste
In a medium size bowl  mix the mushroom and celery soups with the sherry/wine
Pour mixture over the chicken breasts and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese
Cook on LOW setting for 8 to 10 hours, OR on HIGH setting for 4 to 5 hours
